text: Viktar Sotnikaw (; ; born 27 July 2001) is a Belarusian professional footballer. As of 2020, he plays for Shakhtyor Soligorsk.Player's profile at pressball.by ==References== == External links == * * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Belarus youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Shakhtyor Soligorsk players
title: Viktar Sotnikaw
